Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model

Class Valuation

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model.Valuation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Substitution
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExplState, ImmutableValuation, MutablePartitionedValuation, MutableValuation, SmtLibValuation
public abstract class Valuation extends Object implements Substitution
Interface for a valuation, which is a mapping from declarations to literal expressions.

    • toExpr

      public Expr<BoolType> toExpr()
      Convert a valuation into an expression. For example if the valuation assigns 1 to x and 2 to y, the expression is (x == 1 and y == 2).
      Returns:

    • isLeq

      public boolean isLeq(Valuation that)
      Checks if an other valuation is more general than the current one. This holds if the other valuation has the same or less declarations, and for each declaration, the assigned value is the same.
      Parameters:
      that -
      Returns:
